titleInfo.title: Motor Roads in Western Canada and United States Connections Leading to Calgary & Canadian Rockies

physicalDescription.extent: 35 x 74 cm. on sheet 56 x 86 cm.

mods.note: To right of map is table "Mileage from Calgary". Map distinguishes "Hard Surfaced Highway", "Gravelled Highways", "Dirt ...", "Secondary ...". Below the map are pictures of mountains & downtown Calgary.
On verso are a "Map of a Section of the City of Calgary showing routes through the City ...", 25 x 19 cm. Also text & pictures.

1940 Publisher now Calgary Board of Trade (Chamber of Commerce). Scale reduced to ca. 1:4,900,000. Col. map 28.5 x 59 cm. on sheet 46.5 x 62.5 cm. The verso map is still there. Photos are of "Bad lands, near Drumheller ..."; [view of oil wells at Turner Valley different to 1939 ed.]; Central MemoriaL Park, Calgary; & others.
